data.content: Added 36 unit tests for BdCliBackend in src/lib/__tests__/bd-cli-backend.test.ts. Coverage went from 22.85% to 100% across all metrics (statements, branches, functions, lines). Tests cover toBR result conversion, filtersToRecord helper, all BackendPort delegation methods, buildTakePrompt branching, and buildPollPrompt UNAVAILABLE stub. Commit a87d978 pushed to main.
